hero.headline: AI-Powered Demand Letter Preparation
hero.subheadline: A compelling demand letter depends on well-organized medical evidence. Dodonai gives personal injury attorneys structured chronologies, deposition summaries, and document extracts to draft demand packages that drive faster, higher-value settlements.

sections.heading: How AI Demand Letter Preparation Strengthens Your Demand Package
paragraphs: Adjusters evaluate demands based on how thoroughly the medical evidence is organized. A demand backed by a detailed chronology carries more weight than a stack of unorganized records — and AI demand letter tools make that level of organization practical on every case.

Dodonai accelerates every step of that process. Upload your client's medical records and receive a complete {{link:/ai-medical-record-summaries-chronologies/|medical chronology}} that documents every diagnosis, treatment, provider visit, and medication change in chronological order. Upload deposition transcripts and get {{link:/deposition-summary-software/|page-line summaries}} highlighting liability admissions, damages testimony, and causation evidence. Standard BI demand, policy limits demand, time-limit demand — the documented evidence is organized and ready for all of them.

For {{link:/practice-areas/personal-injury/|personal injury firms}} handling high volumes on contingency, faster AI demand letter preparation directly impacts revenue. Every week a case sits waiting on documentation is a week without settlement movement. Dodonai cuts the documentation phase from days to minutes so your team can send demands sooner and resolve cases faster.

cards.title: Medical Chronologies for Demand Packages
cards.description: Generate a complete timeline from date of loss through treatment, surgery, rehab, and MMI. Each entry includes date, provider, event description, and a page number pointing to the original — giving adjusters the organized medical evidence for demand packages they need to move your claim through valuation.

cards.title: Deposition Summaries with Key Testimony
cards.description: Liability admissions, damages testimony, expert opinions — pulled from transcripts with accurate page-line citations. Use topic-focused summaries to weave the most relevant testimony into your demand letter.

cards.title: Treatment Gap and Provider Analysis
cards.description: Treatment gaps and provider changes jump off the chronology immediately. Spot the records that support your damages narrative — and anticipate the inconsistencies a defense adjuster will flag — before you finalize.

cards.title: Demand-Ready the Same Afternoon
cards.description: Traditional preparation requires days of manual record review before drafting begins. Dodonai compresses the documentation phase from days to minutes, so your team can start drafting the same afternoon records arrive.

cards.title: Lower Per-Case Costs on Contingency
cards.description: Outsourcing medical record review for a single case can cost thousands. Dodonai processes pages for as little as $0.02 each — on contingency, every dollar saved on case prep stays in the recovery.

cards.title: Secure Handling of Medical Evidence
cards.description: Demand packages contain PHI. Every upload runs through AES-256 encryption on HIPAA-compliant, SOC 2-certified infrastructure. Signed BAAs on every account. Records stay out of any training pipeline.

items.title: Upload Medical Records and Transcripts
items.description: Upload your client's medical records, deposition transcripts, and supporting documents. The platform handles PDFs of any size — including scanned records — without reformatting or preprocessing.

items.title: AI Builds Your Evidence Foundation
items.description: Dodonai generates a detailed medical chronology, narrative summary, and deposition digests. Specify key topics like specific injuries or liability issues to tailor the output toward your demand letter themes.

items.title: Draft Your Demand Letter with Organized Evidence
items.description: Use the structured chronologies and summaries as your foundation. Every data point links back to the source page, so you can cite specific records and testimony with confidence. Export in PDF, Word, or Excel.

faq.question: How does AI help with demand letter preparation?
faq.answer: AI handles the most time-consuming part: organizing the medical evidence. Upload records and get a structured chronology with citations, a narrative summary, and deposition digests — the documented foundation you need to draft a demand package without days of manual review.

faq.question: Can Dodonai generate a demand letter for me?
faq.answer: Dodonai doesn't draft the demand letter itself. It produces the organized chronologies, summaries, and deposition digests that form the evidentiary backbone. Your attorneys retain full control over the damages narrative, legal arguments, demand amount, and response deadline.

faq.question: What information does the medical chronology include for demand letters?
faq.answer: Dates, provider names, diagnoses, treatments, procedures, medications, and clinical notes — all chronological with source-page citations. This lets you itemize specials with supporting documentation and articulate the full treatment arc from injury through MMI.

faq.question: How quickly can I prepare a demand package with Dodonai?
faq.answer: Medical record processing completes in minutes regardless of file size. A 500-page record set that would take a paralegal 8-12 hours is organized in under 15 minutes. You can have all the documentation you need to begin drafting within hours of receiving the records.

faq.question: Is the output accurate enough to cite in a demand letter?
faq.answer: Yes. Every entry in the chronology and every statement in the deposition summary includes a citation linked directly to the underlying record. Your attorneys can verify any data point before including it. We recommend a brief review pass, just as you would with any vendor's work product.

faq.question: How much does it cost to prepare a demand package with Dodonai?
faq.answer: Pages process for as little as $0.02 each on the Pro plan, compared to $5-$15 per page from outsourced review services. For contingency firms preparing multiple demand packages monthly, the cost difference shows up on every case. Visit our {{link:/pricing/|pricing page}} for details.
